summary: Chris Marker and Pierre Lhomme's LE JOLI MAI (The Lovely Month of May) is a portrait of Paris and Parisians during May 1962;the first springtime of peace after the ceasefire with Algeria ... See full summary Â»
cast: Chris Marker|Yves Montand|Simone Signoret|Jean-Luc Godard|Anna Karina|Edgar Morin|Alain Resnais|Jacques Rivette|Jean Rouch
title: Le joli mai
